actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit certain naturalized citizens of the United States to hold the offices of President and Vice President.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Permits a naturalized citizen of the United States who is otherwise eligible to hold the office of the President or Vice President to hold such offices after being a citizen for 11 years.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit certain naturalized citizens of the United States to hold the offices of President and Vice President.
